AbilitiesInfo.name: Acrobat
AbilitiesInfo.description: Add 3cm to Prowess tasks when climbing (added after roll is halved) and reduce difficulty for falling task rolls by 3.

AbilitiesInfo.name: Armour Breaker
AbilitiesInfo.description: -1 to foes armour value.

AbilitiesInfo.name: Battle Cry
AbilitiesInfo.description: Once per game, a battle cry causes all foes within X (X=hero vitality) cm to have a penalty of -X to rolls for the remainder of the turn; this counts as a task with difficulty 0.

AbilitiesInfo.name: Born In The Saddle
AbilitiesInfo.description: No Vitality point cost to ride a horse.

AbilitiesInfo.name: Brute
AbilitiesInfo.description: +3 to Prowess rolls involving brute strength.

AbilitiesInfo.name: Dark Soul
AbilitiesInfo.description: +2 to all Summoning rolls.

AbilitiesInfo.name: Defensive Fighter
AbilitiesInfo.description: +2 to defense rolls, but no damage dealt if combat won.

AbilitiesInfo.name: Devout
AbilitiesInfo.description: +2 to rituals or tasks related to your faith.

AbilitiesInfo.name: Disarm
AbilitiesInfo.description: If a critical is rolled, foe may be disarmed rather than dealt an extra point of damage. Foe now fights with the unarmed penalty.

AbilitiesInfo.name: Eagle Eyed
AbilitiesInfo.description: +2 to Wits tasks based upon perception.

AbilitiesInfo.name: Fast
AbilitiesInfo.description: +2 to all movement related Prowess tasks.

AbilitiesInfo.name: Fearless
AbilitiesInfo.description: +3 to fear related tasks.

AbilitiesInfo.name: Good Aim
AbilitiesInfo.description: +2 to archery tasks.

AbilitiesInfo.name: Good Luck Charm
AbilitiesInfo.description: Once per game another character may add +4 to any roll.

AbilitiesInfo.name: Healing Hands
AbilitiesInfo.description: +2 to healing tasks.

AbilitiesInfo.name: Knockback
AbilitiesInfo.description: A critical may be used to knock an opponent back 2cm (4cm if you have a shield) in place of increased damage.

AbilitiesInfo.name: Light Fingered
AbilitiesInfo.description: +2 to lockpicking and pick-pocketing type tasks.

AbilitiesInfo.name: Light Footed
AbilitiesInfo.description: +2 to stealth tasks.

AbilitiesInfo.name: Lightning Reflexes
AbilitiesInfo.description: +2 to initiative rolls.

AbilitiesInfo.name: Listened To By The Gods
AbilitiesInfo.description: Once per game you may re-roll a single task.

AbilitiesInfo.name: Lucky Blow
AbilitiesInfo.description: Once per gam you may turn a draw in hand to hand combat into a win.

AbilitiesInfo.name: Martial Artist
AbilitiesInfo.description: No penalty for fighting without a weapon.

AbilitiesInfo.name: Mithridates
AbilitiesInfo.description: Grants immunity to poisons.

AbilitiesInfo.name: Night Sight
AbilitiesInfo.description: Can see in near total darkness as if it were day.

AbilitiesInfo.name: Pack Animal
AbilitiesInfo.description: No movement penalty from wearing armor.

AbilitiesInfo.name: Scholar
AbilitiesInfo.description: +2 to Wits tasks involving recollection of knowledge.

AbilitiesInfo.name: Tough As Old Boots
AbilitiesInfo.description: Ignore the first point of damage taken in each game.

AbilitiesInfo.name: Ambush
AbilitiesInfo.description: Creature Only: Foes passing within 7cm must make a Wits task against a difficulty of 7 or be ambushed; this attack may not be defended against (worn armour bonuses still apply.

AbilitiesInfo.name: Armoured Hide
AbilitiesInfo.description: Creature Only: Creature is considered to have heavy armour.

AbilitiesInfo.name: Crushing Blow
AbilitiesInfo.description: Creature Only: Causes critical on 5 or 6.

AbilitiesInfo.name: Piercing
AbilitiesInfo.description: Creature Only: Same as Armour Breaker but does not apply to shields.

AbilitiesInfo.name: Regeneration
AbilitiesInfo.description: Creature Only: At the end of any turn in which the creature took damage, roll 1 D6; on a 6 restore 1 Vitality point.

AbilitiesInfo.name: Sprint
AbilitiesInfo.description: Creature Only: Once per game, for one turn double rolled movement distance.

AbilitiesInfo.name: Thick Hide
AbilitiesInfo.description: Creature Only: Creature is considered to have light armour.
